r.d: Support for JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) serialization. This is a drop-in alternative to PHP standard json extension.
r.n: - windows build support (thanks to weltling) - build as json.so or jsonc.so (--with-jsonc option) - rename LIBJSON_VERSION to HAVE_LIBJSON (internal only) - parse 64 bits integer as float, or string, on 32 bits build
